details:
Themonospot is a simple application that can be used to scan an avi and
 matroska (.mkv) file and extract some informations about audio and video
 data flow:

  - Video codec used
  - Frame size
  - Average video bitrate
  - File size
  - Total time
  - Frame rate
  - Total frames
  - Info data
  - Packet Bitstream
  - User data (in MOVI chunk)
  - Audio codec used
  - Average audio bitrate
  - Audio channelss
 works-with-format::TODO, works-with::video
